Row.Text: Hail wanderer, you stand before the guardian of mighty Carthage, favoured empire of Ba'al-hamon. If you seek with Carthage turmoil, then I will march a storm upon your pathetic armies and have your greatest generals weep in fear.

Hail. I am Hannibal, son of Hamilcar Barca. I am the guardian of Carthage. As is Ba'al-hamon our most fearsome lord in heaven, I am the most fearsome man to walk this earth, and my armies are the most fearsome to march upon its soil.
Let us ease your people's fears, who think it long to await the death of this old man.
I will not tolerate your wasting my time.
I am no merchant. You will have to try harder than that to convince me.
Back so soon?
You sure do like talking to me don't you?
You must have something better to do than talk to me all the time. Or maybe you don't.
And what do you want this time?
You are a friend to Carthage and thus a friend to me. I will offer you what assistance I can.
Greetings.
What would you like to discuss?
What brings you here today?
Go on.
Let us begin.
You are near to making yourself an enemy to Carthage. What do you want?
The end is near. What is it you wish to speak about?
I know when I'm staring defeat in the face. Have you come to discuss terms?
Is it not time we ended this war?
For the good of our two nations, let us make peace.
The time has come to put down our arms.
Come to beg for mercy?
Lost the will to fight?
What's the matter? Tired of battle?
What business does a dishonorable individual such as yourself have here?
Always a pleasure working with you, friend. What brings you to my court?
It won't be long before we'll have dealt with {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}. I can just feel it.
I hope you're looking forward to the downfall of {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} as much as I am.
Soon we'll have dealt with {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} once and for all.
Soon, your pathetic war will swallow your empire whole, and I shall revel in the victory, for it shall be a victory for all.
Though we are not allies, I offer my condolences to your war effort.
You are tempting a storm that I warn you you cannot hope to defeat. Get your armies away from Carthage.
The positioning of your military is somewhat worrisome. I advise you to withdraw for the sake of future peace. Now, what would you like to talk about?
I will not tolerate your expansion for much longer. You try the patience of Carthage.
I grow concerned about your efforts to claim all the land that belongs to Carthage. I hope you know what my concern means for you.
If you do not cease your purchase of land near to Carthage, I will be forced to march my armies upon your empire and reclaim what has been stolen.
I grow concerned about your efforts to purchase all the land that belongs to Carthage. I hope you know what my concern means for you.
I welcome a man of such skill in war as I as a brother.
Your empire is famous for its strong economy. Perhaps you'll use it to bolster your meagre armies.
You have very few cities. If you're not careful, you might succumb to invasion by a greater power.
You must consider increasing the size of your army, or you will stand no chance on this earth.
Meet me on the battlefield, tyrant. Let us see how long your wicked ways will last against the might of Carthage.
No. It is not within my powers to grant you this.
Friend, I have a serious matter to discuss. My relationship with {1_CivName} has broken down, and I need you to denounce them as a show of support. What do you say?
Pathetic. So you now show your true colors. The world will know of your dishonor.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

So that is the kind of ally you are then? The rest of the world's leaders will hear of your betrayal.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

I've had enough of you. I've told the other leaders of the world that working with you is a mistake.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Alright, enough is enough. Informing everyone else of your ill deeds is long overdue.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
I will not stand by this denunciation.
You are a fool. You have damned your empire to mockery.
Ahhh, I've noticed that you've become friends with {1_CivName}. Glad to hear of it. I'm already on good terms with them myself.
{1_CivName} lacks as much honour as does a merchant's purse. Do not trust them.
You are a fool in making your sentiments toward {1_CivName} known to me. I assure you that Carthage stands firm at their side.
This act of denouncement against {1_CivName} will hopefully make them rethink the way in which they view this world.
I noticed that you have declared your friendship with {1_CivName}. I will do the same, for I honour the friends of my friend.
I do not believe you have made a wise choice in befriending {1_CivName}. I will speak to my government, and seek to move against you both.
Oh great, now the vermin are breeding. Now I have to deal with both you and {1_CivName}? I'll have to teach them a lesson.
Anyone who you don't get along with is clearly worth building a friendship with. Give {1_CivName} my regards.
I see your armies amassed near my empire. If you wish to attack then come. Don't hide in the shadows like a child.
It's come to my attention that you have a large number of Units near my borders. I request that you move them elsewhere to avoid causing undue distress to my citizens.
It seems your word is worth nothing, as your conquest of {@1_MinorCivName} shows. How despicable. The world will know of your crimes.
Your wanton aggression against {@1_MinorCivName} does not go unnoticed. You will face serious consequences should you continue assault.
Your expansion efforts are an insult. Know that there will be consequences for this.
I couldn't help but notice that you seem to be expanding into lands which I regard to be mine. I request that you reconsider this.
Your habit of claiming every bit of land you've spotted has not gone unnoticed. I advise you to discontinue this.
If you should continue to expand your empire in lands I feel are mine it can only ruin the possibility of friendship between us.
The settling of your people near my sovereign territory is placing a strain upon relations between our two nations.
Your guarantee of not expanding near us seems to have been empty words. Know that there will be consequences for this.
The aggressive manner in which you buy up territory near us is an insult. I had hoped you would be a better neighbor.
Your purchase of land in my vicinity has caused some alarm. I caution you so that this issue does not become more serious.
So it seems you lied when you told us that your empire would stop purchasing land near us. I do not take this insult lightly.
I am very disappointed that you did not stop funding land acquisition near my territory. I had hoped you were a more honorable leader.
It is hard to find worthy friends in this world. I'd like to make a public Declaration of Friendship, informing the other empires of the bond between our peoples. What do you say?
Great leader, would you care to make a Declaration of Friendship to the world? My hope is that we can build a long-lasting bond between our two empires.
It is hard to find worthy friends in this world. I'd like to make a public Declaration of Friendship, informing the other empires of the bond between our peoples. What do you say?
Great leader, would you care to make a Declaration of Friendship to the world? My hope is that we can build a long-lasting bond between our two empires.

I will stand by no longer while you continue to bring despair and mayhem to this world. Carthage stands firmly against you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

Your continued injustices against your people, and against the nations of this earth, cannot be abided by. The world must be told of your misdeeds.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has dishonoured mighty Carthage. Will you pledge your support in doing war with them?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has subjected my ancestors to their honour for long enough. Will you join me in forcing them beneath ours?
The time for war against {1_PlayerName:textkey} has become.
Your actions are unforgivable. There can never be reconciliation between our two nations.
Given the circumstances, I have no choice but to assume you are my enemy. As such, I will do what I must to protect my interests.
I wanted to make it known to you that I value our friendship, and hope that it might remain strong.
It is clear to all that you are a wise and mighty ruler. I ask that you might also be compassionate towards those like myself who are weak.
Oh great one, my hope is that you will long serve as a paragon of strength and virtue for lesser leaders such as myself.
Your highly aggressive behavior has not gone unnoticed. Should you keep it up, it will ultimately lead to your downfall.
It's clear you're a fairly uncivilized brute. I have to warn you, your actions are starting to attract quite a bit of attention.
Your warmongering is a popular topic these days. Better watch your back.
You're starting to attract quite a bit of attention. That's not a good thing.

It's come to my attention that you're getting a little friendly with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. In case you weren't aware, they're within my sphere of influence, and I'd prefer if you stayed out of it.
I've noticed your relationship with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. While that's nice, it would be best that you leave their protection to us. I'd hate for either of us to step on any toes.
I couldn't help but notice how pathetic you are. And when I realized it I couldn't help but share.
Ah, it's always nice to see my favorite city-state again.
I'm really getting tired of seeing your face. My hope is that one day you'll just go away or something.
Ah, it's you. My apologies. Sometimes I get you mixed up with the barbarians I have to swat from time to time.
I thought you might like to know that your army is a little on the weak side. Better watch your back.
With an army so weak it's a surprise your empire hasn't succumb to a barbarian invasion.
Our words are backed with nuclear weapons!
It's a shame there are some leaders in this world who have their fun by picking on the weak. Don't you agree?
I can hear your people wailing in sorrow all the way over in my empire. If you don't do something soon they might just pack up and find a real civilization to live in.
With people so unhappy it's a shock to me that they'd keep you around as their leader.
It's come to my attention that your empire appears to be quite puny. Did you forget to expand your borders or are you just having a little trouble with that?
Travelers have told us that your empire's economy is in pretty sad shape. If you beg a little I might give you a hand. Okay, actually I won't.
What a sad sight... your empire is so uncultured. What do your citizens do all day, beat rocks together?
Rumor has it that your culture is so laughable that even the barbarians are shying away from your lands.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
We've been over this before. The answer is still no.
Very well. I will speak to my government and persuade this settlement.
Carthage will not submit to your senseless demands.
That will work. May a strong friendship lead to the flourishing of our empires.
An excellent idea. May our alliance be the envy of the world.
I am happy to accept. May our empires prosper in friendship.
I must decline.
Sorry, but no. Perhaps another time.
I fear that such an arrangement is not in my best interests, so I must decline.
That sounds like a wise move. Let us take to the battlefield.
That is an intriguing offer. I accept. However, my empire is not yet prepared, so give me 10 turns. I will come to you again when I am ready.
Very well. I do what I must to maintain peace in my lands.
I will do what it takes to keep the peace.
Fine. But know that you poison your reputation with acts such as these. For what that might be worth to you.
Please. You're in no position to make such demands.
You should be well aware of your own inability to back those threats up.
You're not fooling anyone. I have nothing to fear from you.
Haha! You are not strong enough to make such demands of me.
You dare insult me in such a manner? If you want something so badly then do your best to come and take it.
You'll have to take it from my dead body.
If you want that you'll have to come and get it.
Unacceptable.
Don't be a fool.
You ask for too much. I will not drive my nation into poverty to satisfy your greed.
No. I have my dignity, and refuse to hand over such a great bounty so freely.
Your desire to strip my lands of so much wealth is intolerable. Do not ask for so much.
You threaten me again so soon? I refuse your demands, you vile beast.
Asking again so soon? You know that greed is a vice, great leader...
Asking for the fruits of others' labor yet again? Your greed is legendary. I will not give in to you.
Let's hear your offer.
What do you propose?
The time has come to end this war. What do you think of this arrangement?
There is no point in this conflict continuing any further. Let us return to peace.
We must not let war define who we are. The time has come to make peace.
You have something I want. If you don't hand it over quietly I'll have no choice but to take it by force.
Unfortunately things aren't going terribly well over here. Can you spare something for a friend? I'll try to return the favor when things are going better for me.
Although it pains me to do so, I must ask for your assistance, friend.
Your great strength is a model for all other empires. I ask that you show generosity towards those less fortunate.
I believe it's in our mutual interest to allow free passage between our two great empires.
Opening our borders to one another can only serve to solidify our friendship.
I would like to negotiate passage through your territory.

I would like to lay plans for establishing a Research Agreement with your great nation. Doing so would require each of us to spend 150 [ICON_GOLD]. What do you think?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet)
I feel that a Research Agreement is a mutually beneficial arrangement that would help serve to cement our Friendship.
This deal strengthened our nations and our bonds of friendship. Shall we renew this deal and continue our shared prosperity?
This deal has faded in our eyes over the years. To renew this deal, we would need more from your side of the negotiation.
You have a resource that we require.

You have made a careless mistake in allowing me the opportunity to bring down Carthage's wrath upon you. Your generals will tremble in the arms of their wives when they hear my trumpet call them to battle!
I may fail to overcome your evil, but it won't be for lack of effort.
Given the circumstances, destroying you would make victory all the sweeter.
Destroy me if you can. I can promise you though, I will not fall before you easily.
So be it. My armies will fight to the death against your wicked forces.
You will forever be known as a villain who preys on the weak.
Do you really think that you can defeat me? Fool. Very well. Let us play this game then.
Your armies are welcome to come and enjoy the destruction that will befall them.
Attacking me was a mistake. I will soon show you why.
Declaring war was a serious error in judgment on your part. That having been said, I will not hesitate to make you regret it.
I will not hesitate to punish you for making such a foolish move.
Good. Let us do this. It gives me an excellent opportunity to finally destroy you.
You wretched fool. I will now mercilessly crush you.

You have made a careless mistake in allowing me the opportunity to bring down Carthage's wrath upon you. Your generals will tremble in the arms of their wives when they hear my trumpet call them to battle!
While now may not be the ideal moment for us to cross swords, the opportunity to take you down a notch or two is worth it.
Haha. Well, I won't question your decision, but it appears to me that you've made a big mistake.
I was mistaken when I thought there was an ounce of honour in your blood. I will prove this by spilling it for all your men to see.
I was mistaken when I thought there was an ounce of honour in your blood. I will prove this by spilling it for all your men to see.
My ancestors have yielded long enough to your honour. It is time for your people to yield to mine.
I had a feeling that the two of us would some day meet in the field of battle. We will now see which of us is meant to be victorious.
I have come to aide your people in war against your empire. They deserve no more to be oppressed by your dishonour.
You have betrayed your word. Make no mistake, the world will know of your treachery.
Your lands belong to Carthage and as Ba'al-hamon is my witness I shall be the man to deliver them.
My ancestors have yielded long enough to your honour. It is time for your people to yield to mine.
Fate has christened me the one which shall bring unity to this divided planet.
History shall surely smile on me once I've destroyed the likes of you and the rest of the vermin which surround me.
I'll be honest with you - I intend to destroy you along with everyone else.
You are merely a stepping-stone on my grand ascent to world domination.
Now is the time for my master plan to commence. It is time for you to die like the rest of these fools.
You have flaunted your weakness for too long. If I do not take advantage of it, someone else will.
Although the task before me may be impossible, I am compelled to find a way to destroy you and all that you stand for. I will do so or die trying.
It is clear that you are strong. I will, however, find a way to defeat you.
You are a villain without equal. Within every fiber of my being, I know I must destroy you.
Your might is unmatched, but I will find a way to defeat you.
The time to make a stand is now. The odds are not with me, but I find a way to destroy you.
Your incredible strength will not deter me from finding a way to defeat you. May the fates smile on me.
Although I do not wish it, I fear that now may be my only opportunity to defeat you. Let us meet on the battlefield.
Destruction might be the fate which awaits me, but should I back down only eventual defeat awaits anyways.
Although feigning friendship with you wasn't very polite, few who make their mark on history were known for their manners. May your passage be swift.
Your weakness is my opportunity. Placing any trust in me was a mistake.
Backstab is such an ugly word. Shall we instead say I am just "reinterpreting" our supposed friendship?
I have to admit, I never really liked you much. Pretending to do so was getting old anyways. But enough with the small talk, it's time for you to die.
The odds are clearly not with me, but I see no alternative to revealing my deceptive practices. I can now only pray that my armies succeed.
So be it. My armies will extract it from your lands then.
Then war it is.
What is your offer?
What would you suggest?
What is the price of peace?
There can be no peace. Perhaps another day.
This is not the time for negotiation.
We still have business to settle.
No. Glory still beats in my heart.
Excellent.
Wonderful.
I am pleased to hear this.
That is good to hear.
You have my thanks.
You are truly a great leader.
History will long remember your great deeds.
That is a shame.
Perhaps another time then.
That is disappointing.
So be it.
Then you will be responsible for the consequences.
You will regret this.
Carthage gives her thanks to your mercy in returning one of her civilians.
How dare you? Know that there will be consequences for this.
If you are trying to provoke a war, you're doing a fine job.
Well, at least you're honest. But that may be your only good trait.
A likely story.
There is no honour in your breath. Perhaps it should be stopped.
I only hope that is indeed the case.
There is no honour in your breath. Perhaps it should be stopped.
Yes, that's right.
I remain confident that my decision was the best for my people and my nation.
It seems that you cannot be reasoned with. What a shame.
I have no more business with the likes of you then.
You disappoint us.
You know that this can only sow tension between our two nations.
I thought you might like to know that I've launched an invasion of one of your little pet states. The lands of {@1_MinorCivName} will make a fine addition to my own.
Oops, it seems I've attacked your little friend {@1_MinorCivName}. Care to do something about it?

It's come to my attention that I may have attacked {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. While it was not my goal to be at odds with your empire, this was deemed a necessary course of action.
I've been informed that my empire has commenced an attack on {@1_MinorCivName}. I assure you, this was not on purpose, and hope that this does not serve to drive us apart.
We should consider exchanging embassies, which would allow for more advanced diplomacy between our peoples.
We would like to set up an embassy in your capital. What do you think?
Your bullying of {@1_MinorCivName} is intolerable. I demand that you refrain from squeezing tribute out of city-states under my protection.
I heard about what you did to {@1_MinorCivName}. Did you not realize they are under my protection? Do not provoke me further.
We asked {@1_MinorCivName} for a tribute recently and they gave in. You promised to protect them from such things, but we both know you cannot back that up.
Your little friend {@1_MinorCivName} is so easy to push around. They gave in to our tribute demands, and I don't believe you are in a position to do anything about it.
It's come to my attention that I may have bullied {@1_MinorCivName}, which is under your protection. You do not put their needs above mine, I hope.

I've been informed that my armies have taken tribute from {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. I assure you, this was quite unintentional, and I hope that this does not serve to drive us apart.

Warm salutations to you wise leader! I'm pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Freedom. The free world will be stronger with one more nation to help us all fight against oppression!
Greetings comrade! I'm pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Order. Perhaps we can find some opportunities to aid each other during our empires' next 5-Year Plans!
Welcome great emperor! I'm pleased to see you have also chosen to follow the path of Autocracy. May we work together to ensure that only the very strongest nations survive to achieve true greatness!
How did one of your filthy agents somehow steal one of our basic technological secrets? These may be the last words we speak in peace.
I am willing to overlook your recent theft of one of my technological secrets with a solemn promise that it won't happen again.
I'm glad you agreed to stop this petty thieving.
Your indiscretion is not a surprise.
As you request, our agents will not conduct operations in your territory.
Our agents help keep our civilization safe from all threats, including you. They operate as we need them to, not as you ask.
Thank you for bringing this {@1_CivAdjective} plot to our attention. With this warning, we will be ready for whatever they may try. Your generous aid will be remembered.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army your way in a sneak attack. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts in a sneak attack against your civilization. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
We killed your spy as it was trying to steal from us. From my experience, it is far less dangerous to read a book and try to learn something yourself.
I regret any confusion caused by our late agent's recent activity. Please let any hostile feelings rest with the deceased operative.
Hello there. Are you here about that little spying incident?
One of my cities was recently burglarized and technological secrets were stolen. May I be assured that you had nothing to do with this?
I'm convinced you've been spying on my great civilization. You should stop before somebody gets hurt.
We have taken notice of the religious conversions you are undertaking inside our empire. We must ask you to cease this activity immediately!
I understand that some actions may not be forgiven.
It makes me glad that you will overlook this awkward circumstance.
I'm glad you agreed to end this proselytizing.
Your religious fervor is unsettling.
As you wish, our missionaries will no longer share the one true faith with the people in your cities.
In spite of your protests, your citizens will continue to be enlightened by our missionaries, even though you damn your own people to live in ignorance.
We are eagerly anticipating your unconditional surrender.
Your complete capitulation sounds reasonable.
We can make a deal now to forestall your utter annihilation.
We were very pleased to hear your recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. It seems that our goals are aligned.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} suits our interests quite nicely. You have our sincere gratitude.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} is a blatant attack on our interests. I hope this does not escalate to future conflict.
I found your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} very troubling. Surely there is a better way to resolve our differences than petty politics.
Thanks to the help of your delegates, our recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was successful. We look forward to your continued support, and will try to return the favor.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} succeeded, with the support of your delegation. Together we can accomplish many great things.
Your delegation played a part in the failure of our proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. I do not take such transgressions lightly.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was defeated at the hands of your delegates. Do not expect our delegation to support your interests in the future.
We thank you for entrusting the World Congress to our capable leadership. I expect great things to come in the {1_LeagueName}.
We'll see about that.
Yes, that's right.
I remain confident that my decision was the best for my people and my nation.
Very well. I'll be monitoring the situation.
We are not willing to offer you enough to make this a fair trade.
Any deal we suggest would result in an unfair exchange for you.
We've noticed that you've been looking for cultural artifacts within our borders. This needs to stop.
Sorry, our plans are too important to be stopped over a trinket.
As you wish, we will stop looking for artifacts within your borders.
Do I have to escalate this?
Thank you for heeding our request. An artifact discovered on our land belongs to our people, not yours.
I'll dig wherever I want.
We meant no offense when attempting to steal your cultural heritage.
The people of my nation have been corrupted by your bourgeois messages of liberty and equality. They seem to believe they have the right to demonstrate in the streets!
Your ideological plotting has us scared of a revolution for Order in our land. Will these workers' strikes never end?
Your message of strength through supreme power has resonated with our people. Must we imitate your feared totalitarian state?
Your citizens clamor for human liberties. Tear down this wall of oppression and join the cause of Freedom and progress!
The oppressed workers of your land are unhappy. Whether you like it or not, history is on our side. We will bury you!
Your restless people are in need of strong leadership. Join us in writing history instead of sitting there with your hands folded.
With celebration, we greet you in joining us in our quest for Freedom. Ask not what we can do individually, ask instead what we can do together.
Give us the child for eight years and it will be a socialist forever. Your working class have heard this truth; now we welcome them to our revolutionary struggle for Order.

You will not regret your move to Autocracy. All within the state; nothing outside the state; nothing against the state. Only the strong leaders of strong states can bring the world into a glorious new era together.
We are glad to see that sales of our souvenirs to tourists from your lands have reached record levels. The amazing works of our civilization are truly inspiring!
